title: "Artificial intelligence PC to reshape and revitalize the IT industry"
excerpt: "Lenovo, the world's biggest PC maker, unveiled its first AI PC, which will be commercially available in 2024. It is a part of the company's strategy \"AI for All,\" with total investment of US$1 billion in artificial intelligence innovation, chairman and chief executive Yang Yuanqing said recently."
